entry.title: Newsletter #106
entry.content:
Hi there!

Tech Thursday has come again and our Alex, Cirpo and Oba are flying towards Europe to attend a conference! Have fun guys!

Links? Here they are!

  • what is the most bizarre css or html question you have ever been asked in a job interview? – quora

  • chat example by vue.js + webpack

  • clowwindy/awesome-networking

  • comparing node.js vs php performance – hostingadvice.com

  • executable images – how to dockerize your development machine

  • gilliam – a micro services platform

  • how ui became a thing at docker | docker blog

  • is reactjs overtaking angularjs as the most popular front end web framework? – quora

  • migrating bajillions of database records at stripe | robert heaton

  • official google blog: google’s look, evolved

  • php vs. node.js: an epic battle for developer mind share | infoworld

  • publishing blogs with github, circleci, and google analytics | nextdoor engineering

  • semantic release: automated package publishing

  • the illusion of control

  • this smart guy’s built an awesome personal helicopter using drone parts!– daily digest

  • why is it so hard for so many software engineers to get high-quality work experience? – quora

  • How UI Became a Thing at Docker | Docker Blog
